title: Wizard Works x AFRICAP Memphis Cycling Cap
content:
The new AFRICAP X Wizard Works cycling cap (£23) launches today, celebrating both brand’s shared love of fun prints and handmade items. Made in Sierra Leone from 100% cotton Ankara printed fabric, AFRICAP’s soft-brimmed caps have won praise from across the cycling world for their comfort and style.

The name, Memphis, refers to the design style created by Memphis Group in Milan that is synonymous with the 80s, that this print references. AFRICAP is driven by a love for travel, cycling, and style. It merges the essential cycling cap with the bold vibrance of Ankara fabrics, sourced from across West Africa, plastic-free and sewn in Freetown Sierra Leone.

See more at Wizard Works.

The post Wizard Works x AFRICAP Memphis Cycling Cap appeared first on The Radavist.
author: John Watson
